ai_business_context: Sudzy Laundromat is a self-service laundromat with washers, dryers, folding tables, seating, restrooms, vending/soap dispensers, and change/payment machines. Customers commonly report broken or malfunctioning equipment, leaks/water issues, cleanliness problems, and occasional safety/access concerns.
ai_categorization_instructions: Prefer specific categories (e.g., washer_out_of_order vs. general equipment). When unsure, use `other` and add a short note to internal context in the issue description.

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: washer, wash cycle, spin, drum, door lock, out of order, error code
issue_categories.description: Washer is broken, not starting, not draining/spinning, or otherwise unusable.
issue_categories.label: Washer out of order

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: dryer, heat, no heat, not drying, timer, lint, out of order
issue_categories.description: Dryer is broken, not heating, not starting, or otherwise unusable.
issue_categories.label: Dryer out of order

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: change machine, bill, quarter, coins, ate my money, jammed, refund
issue_categories.description: Change machine issues including jams, incorrect change, or taking money.
issue_categories.label: Change machine issue

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: vending, soap, detergent, dispenser, stuck, empty, took my money
issue_categories.description: Vending or soap/supply dispenser problems (empty, jammed, took payment).
issue_categories.label: Vending / dispenser issue

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: leak, water, puddle, flooding, drip, drain, overflow
issue_categories.description: Water leaks, puddles, drainage problems, or flooding.
issue_categories.label: Water leak / drainage

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: dirty, spill, trash, sticky, smell, odor, grime, sanitize
issue_categories.description: General cleanliness issues in customer areas.
issue_categories.label: Cleanliness

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: restroom, toilet, sink, soap, paper towel, hand dryer, clogged
issue_categories.label: Restroom issue

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: light, lighting, flicker, dark, outlet, power, breaker
issue_categories.description: Lighting or electrical issues in the facility.
issue_categories.label: Lighting / electrical

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: door, lock, handle, broken glass, entrance, accessibility, ramp
issue_categories.label: Access / entry

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: slip, trip, hazard, sharp, broken, safety, security, suspicious
issue_categories.label: Safety / security

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: refund, credit, charged, payment, card, app, price
issue_categories.description: Payment, pricing, or refund-related issues not specific to a single machine type.
issue_categories.label: Payment / refund

issue_categories.description: Use when no other category fits. Add a short internal note in the issue description.
issue_categories.label: Other

comments.body: Thanks for flagging—refunds available at the counter during attendant hours. If you can, note the time and bill type.

issues.description: Change Machine #1 intermittently accepts bills but does not dispense quarters. Internal note: categorize as change_machine_issue (not payment_or_refund) because it’s machine-specific.

reports.body: Put in a $10 and it just sat there thinking, then gave nothing back and no quarters.
Change machine ate my $5. Screen said 'processing' and then went back to the start.
Same machine is still acting up—took my bill and didn’t spit out quarters. Please fix or put an out-of-order sign.

issues.title: Change machine taking bills without dispensing quarters

updates.message: Technician contacted; placed temporary notice and began tracking failed transactions.
Bill validator cleaned and tested; monitoring for repeat failures.

issues.description: Washer in Row A is not completing cycles and leaves clothes soaked. Customers report error beeps and failure to spin.

reports.body: One of the front loaders in Row A stopped mid-cycle and started beeping. Door wouldn’t open for a while.
Washer didn’t spin at the end—my clothes were dripping wet. Had to pay for extra dryer time.

issues.title: Washer in Row A not finishing / not spinning

updates.message: Attendant confirmed intermittent spin failure; machine tagged for service.

comments.body: We mopped and put down a caution sign. Maintenance is checking the drain line behind Row B.

issues.description: Recurring puddle forming near large-capacity washers in Row B. Possible drain/overflow issue creating slip hazard.

reports.body: There’s a big puddle in front of the big washers. Almost slipped carrying my basket.
Water keeps pooling by the large machines. Looks like it’s coming from under one of them.
Still wet over there today. Please put a wet floor sign at least.

issues.title: Puddle forming by large-capacity washers (Row B)

updates.message: Area cleaned; caution sign placed; inspecting drain and hose connections.
Found slow drain; scheduled plumber to snake/clear line.

issues.description: Dryer Row 2 has at least one unit not heating properly; customers report needing multiple cycles.

reports.body: Dryer in Row 2 ran but there was basically no heat. Clothes still damp after 40 minutes.
Same issue—tumbler works but it’s cold air. Wasted money.

issues.title: Dryer in Row 2 running with little/no heat

updates.message: Unit identified and taken out of service pending heating element/igniter check.

issues.description: Folding tables have sticky residue and lint buildup; trash bins near folding area overflowing at peak times.

reports.body: Folding tables are sticky and covered in lint. Had to wipe it down myself.
Trash can by the folding tables was overflowing and there was loose dryer lint everywhere.

issues.title: Sticky folding tables and lint buildup

comments.body: Restroom supplies were restocked this afternoon. Please let us know if the sink is still draining slowly.

issues.description: Restroom supplies and cleanliness concerns: low/empty soap and paper towels; sink draining slowly.

reports.body: Bathroom was out of paper towels and the soap dispenser was empty.
Sink drains super slow and there was water all over the counter.
Restroom smelled bad and trash was full.

issues.title: Restroom out of supplies and sink draining slowly

updates.message: Restocked soap/paper towels; scheduled drain clean-out.

issues.description: Detergent vending/dispenser appears to take payment but does not dispense product reliably.

reports.body: Soap vending took my money and nothing came out.
The detergent machine is jammed again. I pressed the button and it just clicked.

issues.title: Detergent dispenser taking payment but not dispensing

updates.message: Cleared jam and refilled inventory; tested multiple vends successfully.
Added maintenance check to weekly checklist for dispenser chute and coin mech.

issues.description: Lighting in center aisle flickers and leaves area dim at times; may be ballast/bulb issue.

reports.body: The lights in the middle aisle keep flickering. It’s kind of dark near the dryers.
Still flickering today—gave me a headache while folding.

issues.title: Flickering lights in center aisle

updates.message: Replaced two failing bulbs and one ballast; verified stable lighting.

issues.description: Trip hazard reported near dryer rows due to loose floor mat edge curling up.

reports.body: The mat by the dryers is curled up on the edge. I tripped a little carrying laundry.
Please tape down or replace the mat near the dryers—someone’s going to fall.

issues.title: Loose/curling floor mat near dryers (trip hazard)

updates.message: Mat temporarily taped down; replacement mat ordered.

issues.description: Front entrance door closer slams shut quickly; difficult for customers carrying baskets and for accessibility.

reports.body: Front door slams really hard and fast. Hard to get in with a cart.
Door closer needs adjusting—almost hit my kid when it snapped shut.

issues.title: Front door slamming shut too quickly

updates.message: Adjusted door closer speed and latch; tested with cart entry.

issues.description: Seating area has crumbs and spills; upholstery appears stained and needs deeper cleaning.

reports.body: Chairs are gross—crumbs and sticky spots on the seats.
There was a spilled drink by the seats that looked like it had been there a while.

issues.title: Seating area dirty with spills and crumbs

updates.message: Added seating area wipe-down to mid-day cleaning routine.

comments.body: If you still have the time of the transaction, we can look it up and issue a refund. Sorry about that.

issues.description: Customer reports being charged twice at the customer service counter for a laundry card/top-up. Internal note: not tied to a specific machine; categorize as payment_or_refund.

reports.body: I think I got charged twice when I added money. My bank shows two pending charges.

issues.title: Possible double charge at counter for top-up

updates.message: Requested transaction time/amount to verify in POS; monitoring for duplicate authorizations.

issues.description: Parking lot lighting reported dim near far corner; customers feel unsafe at night.

reports.body: Parking lot is really dark on the far side. Didn’t feel safe walking to my car.
One of the lights outside looks out. Please fix it.

issues.title: Dim/out parking lot light (safety concern)

updates.message: Identified fixture with failed bulb/photocell; replacement parts ordered.

issues.description: Small drip observed near utility closet door; water tracked into customer area during busy hours. Internal note: source may be HVAC/condensate line—confirm during inspection.

reports.body: There’s water dripping near the staff closet door and it makes the floor slick.
Noticed a wet spot by the utility closet again today. Might be from a pipe?

issues.title: Drip/wet floor near utility closet door

updates.message: Tightened condensate line connection and added drip tray; area dried and monitored.
